attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK democracy.

Is it still viable?

Over 70% of laws for the UK are provided from Europe.

Why therefore do we still have over 600 MP's in the Uk Parliament when the bulk of our laws are made in Europe? 

Should we not, if we agree with the European Union then still have 600 
+ MP's at a very high cost to the UK taxpayer? 

Is this logical?

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a call for action, not your name. The petition itself must propose something, not just ask questions.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
